items.sentence: We found out that the house is infested with garter snakes. They're everywhere.

When I first started teaching here, most of my students couldn't read or write.
I didn't feel like studying because the noise outside was getting on my nerves.
Tom told me that he thought that the dress that Mary was wearing was too short.
Tom bought rye bread, even though Mary had asked him to buy pumpernickel bread.
You can take as many of these apples as you want as long as you leave me a few.
Can you imagine how many Lincoln Logs it would take to build an actual shelter?
You won't be able to do that with just one hand. You'll need to use both hands.
